subject: Hockey, Ice
Blood Clots
lead_paragraph: Doctors discovered a blood clot in Pascal Dupuis’s lung. Dupuis, 35, will use blood thinners to treat the condition but is out for the rest of the regular season and possibly longer.
snippet: Doctors discovered a blood clot in Pascal Dupuis’s lung. Dupuis, 35, will use blood thinners to treat the condition but is out for the rest of the regular season and possibly longer.
